long_description: A soft lambswool/nylon wrap for cold-weather wear, the Patagonia Pine Mountain Wrap drapes elegantly and has a geometric knit pattern and stylish asymmetrical hem. 80% lambswool provides naturally insulating warmth; 20% nylon adds durability. Open wrap sweater lends flair to jeans or a dress for almost any occasion. Striking jacquard knit in front is complemented by the solid jersey-knit panel in back. Patagonia Pine Mountain Wrap falls to hip length.
short_description: A soft lambswool/nylon wrap for cold-weather wear, the Patagonia Pine Mountain Wrap drapes elegantly and has a geometric knit pattern and stylish asymmetrical hem.
